page.title: 09BO'NESS RECREATION CENTRE
page.content: The recreation centre is open seven days a week. It opens from 9.00a.m. till 11.00 p.m. and people come from the town. Facilities: It has a swimming pool,a sauna,solorium and a sports hall. It has a lesser hall with a stage,an adult games room with snooker,pool, darts etc. There are 2 squash courts, a T.V. room,conditioning room, cafeteria,a viewing lounge,creche, photography dark room,work shop, garage,hairdressing salon,football, hockey and rugby pitches. Clubs: Archery,badminton,basketball, harriers,indoor bowls,roller skating, hockey (indoor & outdoor),tennis, (indoor),squash,swimming,subaqua, yoga,discos,gymnastics,weight-training football,rugby,keepfit,table-tennis, playgroup,majorettes and radio.
